articles.author: Laurence Norman, Michael R. Gordon
articles.content:
Iran rejected a European Union offer to arrange direct nuclear talks with the U.S., senior diplomats say, risking fresh tension between Tehran and Western capitals.
Two senior Western diplomats said… [+684 chars]
articles.description: Move could trigger new escalation of tensions with Washington, Europe
articles.title: Iran Rejects Offer of Direct U.S. Nuclear Talks, Senior Diplomats Say - The Wall Street Journal

articles.author: PTI
articles.content: India make impressive return to international hockey, beat Germany 6-1
articles.description: Hockey News:  Young Vivek Sagar Prasad scored a brace as the Indian men's hockey team outclassed Germany 6-1 in its Europe tour opener to make an impressive return
articles.title: India make impressive return to international hockey, beat Germany 6-1 - Times of India
